entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow early in the evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
